page.title: 08 Codford by pass
page.content: When the by pass is started in 1986 it will take about two years to build. The by pass will go across a field near Ashton Gifford House. My dad said that they will change the drive so it will lead to the by pass.The amount of traffic will be cut considerably. The northern route was dropped because it was over the ministry of defence land and the route would have been longer and would have involved the cutting into the sides of hills ,it would not have effected so many people. Codford will be a safer place for pedestrians, cyclists and residents who have to get their cars out of garages.The houses on the main street will suffer less structural damage and the value of the properties will rise.
